entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
